section.name: About mmm-util-core
section.p: This module contains fundamental utitlies that are used all over the mmm project. Everything is designed for general purpose and can also be very helpful for any other project. It fully supports the generic type-system of Java5+ and is NOT limited to Java-beans.
section.subsection:
Here are some of the features provided by this module:
Advanced Native Language Support (NLS).
Excellent support to create a Command Line Interface (CLI).
PatternCompiler for glob- and ant-like path-patterns producing java.util.regex.Pattern.
Support for converting values.
Scanner for parsing strings easily.
Date-Utilities for parsing and formatting date and/or time according to ISO-8601.
Stream-Utilities for dealing with streams and readers/writers easily.
Process-Utilities for dealing with external processes and creating pipes.
Utilities for dealing with reflection, generics and annotations.
Advanced POJO-Introspection.
POJO-Navigation for accessing entire object-webs easily.
Generic code for the typical pattern to send and receive events.
Support for loading resources from arbitrary sources.
Utilities for dealing with XML.
A Factory for creating UUIDs.
and many more...
